trans-unit.id: On EE, MMM d, yyyy at %@

trans-unit.note: forward email content header, EE,MMM d, yyyy change to your country local format. if you are not sure just keep it as it. %@ part is 12/24 hour format it will be loaded in code.

trans-unit.id: On EE, MMM d, yyyy at %@, %@, wrote:
trans-unit.source: On EE, MMM d, yyyy at %1$@, %2$@, wrote:
trans-unit.target: Dana EE, d. MMM, yyyy u %1$@, %2$@ je napisao/la:
trans-unit.note: reply email content header, EE,MMM d, yyyy change to your country local format. if you are not sure just keep it as it. first %@ is 12/24 hour format, second %@ will be the email hyper link, they will be loaded in code.

trans-unit.id: Our Customer Support team will try to activate your service plan manually if you agree to attach technical data that AppStore provided to the app at the moment of purchase. This data does not include any details about your iTunes account, Apple ID, linked credit cards, or any other user information. Technical data only helps us check and verify that the transaction was fulfilled on the AppStore's servers.
trans-unit.source: Our Customer Support team will try to activate your service plan manually if you agree to attach technical data that AppStore provided to the app at the moment of purchase. This data does not include any details about your iTunes account, Apple ID, linked credit cards, or any other user information. Technical data only helps us check and verify that the transaction was fulfilled on the AppStore's servers.
trans-unit.target: Naš tim za korisničku podršku pokušat će ručno aktivirati vaš servisni plan ako pristanete priložiti tehničke podatke koje je AppStore dostavio u trenutku kupnje. Ovi podaci ne uključuju nikakve pojedinosti o vašem iTunes računu, Apple ID-u, povezanim kreditnim karticama ili bilo kojim drugim korisničkim informacijama. Tehnički podaci nam samo pomažu provjeriti i ovjeriti da li je transakcija dovršena na poslužiteljima AppStorea.

trans-unit.id: Please use ProtonMail App login first.
trans-unit.source: Please use ProtonMail App login first.
trans-unit.target: Najprije koristite prijavu u ProtonMail aplikaciju.

trans-unit.id: Please use the web application to reset your password.
trans-unit.source: Please use the web application to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Molimo da pomoću web aplikacije poništite lozinku.

trans-unit.id: Please use the web version of ProtonMail to change your mailbox password!
trans-unit.source: Please use the web version of ProtonMail to change your mailbox password!
trans-unit.target: Molimo koristite web verziju ProtonMaila da promijenite svoje lozinke sandučića e-pošte!

trans-unit.id: Please use the web version of ProtonMail to change your passwords!
trans-unit.source: Please use the web version of ProtonMail to change your passwords!
trans-unit.target: Molimo koristite web verziju ProtonMaila da promijenite svoje lozinke!

trans-unit.id: Please use your new password when signing in.
trans-unit.source: Please use your new password when signing in.

trans-unit.id: Please wait until the email downloaded!
trans-unit.source: Please wait until the email downloaded!

trans-unit.id: Please, manage it in your phone.
trans-unit.source: Please, manage it in your phone.
trans-unit.target: Molimo, upravljajte time na mobilnom uređaju.

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail Plus is required to customize your mobile signature
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail Plus is required to customize your mobile signature
trans-unit.target: ProtonMail Plus je nužan za uređivanje potpisa na mobilnim uređajima

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail Plus/Professional/Visionary enables you to add and edit contact details beyond just your contact’s name and email. By using ProtonMail, this data will be as secure as your end-to-end encrypted email.
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail Plus/Professional/Visionary enables you to add and edit contact details beyond just your contact’s name and email. By using ProtonMail, this data will be as secure as your end-to-end encrypted email.
trans-unit.target: ProtonMail Plus/Professional/Visionary omogućuje vam dodavanje i uređivanje detalja o kontaktima osim imena i e-pošte kontakta. Pomoću ProtonMaila ti će podaci biti sigurni kao i vaša end-to-end šifrirana e-pošte.

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail doesn't sell ads or abuse your privacy. Your support is essential to keeping ProtonMail running. You can upgrade to a paid account or donate to support ProtonMail.
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail doesn't sell ads or abuse your privacy. Your support is essential to keeping ProtonMail running. You can upgrade to a paid account or donate to support ProtonMail.
trans-unit.target: ProtonMail ne prodaje oglase niti zloupotrebljava vašu privatnost. Vaša podrška je ključna za održavanje ProtonMaila. Možete nadograditi na plaćeni račun ili donirajte za podršku ProtonMailu.

alt-trans.target: ProtonMail ne prodaje oglase niti zloupotrebljava vašu privatnost. Vaša podrška je ključna za održavanje ProtonMail-a. Možete nadograditi na plaćeni račun ili donirajte za podršku ProtonMailu.

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail is currently offline, check our twitter for the current status: https://twitter.com/protonmail
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail is currently offline, check our twitter for the current status: https://twitter.com/protonmail
trans-unit.target: ProtonMail je trenutno nedostupan, provjerite naš twitter za trenutni status: https://twitter.com/protonmail
Upozorenje o adresi e-pošte za oporavak

trans-unit.note: message details-> more action-> report phishing

trans-unit.id: Reporting a message as a phishing attempt will send the message to us, so we can analyze it and improve our filters. This means that we will be able to see the contents of the message in full.
trans-unit.source: Reporting a message as a phishing attempt will send the message to us, so we can analyze it and improve our filters. This means that we will be able to see the contents of the message in full.
trans-unit.target: Prijavljivanje poruke kao pokušaja krađe identiteta će nam poslati poruku kako bismo je mogli analizirati i poboljšati filtre. To znači da ćemo moći vidjeti sadržaj poruke u cijelosti.

trans-unit.note: email verify code resend count down
The title for the popup list, presenting a list of options for creating a contact or creating a contact group
The title for the view where user can select the color for the group

trans-unit.target: Pošalji kao obično, ali pohranjeno šifriranje

trans-unit.id: Sending messages from %@ address is a paid feature. Your message will be sent from your default address %@
trans-unit.source: Sending messages from %1$@ address is a paid feature. Your message will be sent from your default address %2$@
trans-unit.target: Slanje poruka s %1$@ adrese je plaćena značajka. Vaša će poruka biti poslana s Vaše zadane adrese %2$@

trans-unit.id: Sent by ProtonMail with zero access encryption
trans-unit.source: Sent by ProtonMail with zero access encryption
trans-unit.target: Poslano putem ProtonMaila s šifriranjem nultog pristupa
trans-unit.note: encryption lock description for auto reply

trans-unit.id: Sent by you with end-to-end encryption
trans-unit.source: Sent by you with end-to-end encryption
trans-unit.target: Poslano od strane Vas s end-to-end šifriranjem

trans-unit.id: Set a password to encrypt this message for non-ProtonMail users.
trans-unit.source: Set a password to encrypt this message for non-ProtonMail users.
trans-unit.target: Postavite lozinku za šifriranje ove poruke za one koji nisu korisnici ProtonMaila.

trans-unit.note: title of action sheet when quick snooze is active (Snoozed for 30min)
title of action sheet when scheduled scoone is active (Snoozed till 8am)

trans-unit.id: Sorry, we cannot process purchases in the beta version of the iOS app. Thank you for participating in our public beta!
trans-unit.source: Sorry, we cannot process purchases in the beta version of the iOS app. Thank you for participating in our public beta!
trans-unit.target: Nažalost, ne možemo obrađivati kupnje u beta inačici aplikacije na iOS-u. Hvala što sudjelujete u našoj javnoj beta verziji!

trans-unit.note: mail location desc menu title VoiceOver: email is starred

trans-unit.target: Prijeđite prstom s lijeva na desno
Prijeđite prstom s desna na lijevo

trans-unit.id: Tap send anyway to send without expiration to these recipients
trans-unit.source: Tap send anyway to send without expiration to these recipients
trans-unit.target: Pritisnite pošalji ako svejedno želite poslati poruku ovim primateljima, ali bez isteka poruke

trans-unit.id: Thank you for submitting a bug report. We have added your report to our bug tracking system.
trans-unit.source: Thank you for submitting a bug report. We have added your report to our bug tracking system.
trans-unit.target: Hvala što ste poslali izvješće o pogrešci. Dodali smo vaše izvješće našem sustavu za praćenja pogrešaka.
Vjerodajnice za provjeru autentičnosti nisu važeće.

trans-unit.id: The draft cache is broken. Please try again.
trans-unit.source: The draft cache is broken. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Predmemorija skica je neupotrebljiva. Molim te pokušaj ponovno.

trans-unit.id: The draft format incorrectly sending failed!
trans-unit.source: Sending failed. There was an error with the draft format.
trans-unit.target: Format nacrta nije ispravan. Slanje nije uspjelo.

trans-unit.id: The highest level of encryption available.
trans-unit.source: The highest level of encryption available.

trans-unit.id: The maximum number of distinct recipients is %d
trans-unit.source: The maximum number of distinct recipients is %d

trans-unit.id: The maximum number of labels is %d.
trans-unit.source: The maximum number of labels is %d.
The new password can't be empty
trans-unit.target: Nova lozinka ne može biti prazna
Nova lozinka ne može biti prazna.

trans-unit.id: The optional recovery email address allows you to reset your login password if you forget it.
trans-unit.source: The optional recovery email address allows you to reset your login password if you forget it.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalna adresa e-pošte za oporavak omogućuje vam da poništite lozinku za prijavu ako je zaboravite.

trans-unit.id: The password you entered does not match the current password.
trans-unit.source: The password you entered does not match the current password.
trans-unit.target: Lozinka koju ste unijeli ne odgovara trenutnoj lozinki.

trans-unit.id: The passwords you entered do not match.
trans-unit.source: The passwords you entered do not match.
trans-unit.target: Lozinke koje ste unijeli se ne podudaraju.

trans-unit.id: The total attachment size can't be bigger than 25MB
trans-unit.source: The total attachment size can't be bigger than 25MB
trans-unit.target: Ukupna veličina privitka ne smije biti veća od 25MB

trans-unit.id: The total attachment size cannot exceed 25MB
trans-unit.source: The total attachment size cannot exceed 25MB
trans-unit.target: Ukupna veličina privitka ne smije biti veća od 25MB

trans-unit.id: There was an error creating or loading the app's saved data.
trans-unit.source: There was an error creating or loading the app's saved data.
trans-unit.target: Došlo je do pogreške prilikom izrade ili učitavanja spremljenih podataka aplikacije.

trans-unit.id: There was an error creating or loading the application's saved data.
trans-unit.source: There was an error creating or loading the application's saved data.
trans-unit.target: Došlo je do pogreške prilikom izrade ili učitavanja spremljenih podataka aplikacije.

trans-unit.id: This can take a while. Please do not dismiss the app.
trans-unit.source: This can take a while. Please do not dismiss the app.
trans-unit.target: Ovo može potrajati. Nemojte napustiti aplikaciju.

trans-unit.id: This contact belongs to your Address Book.
trans-unit.source: This contact belongs to your address book.

trans-unit.id: This email has failed its domain's authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.source: This email has failed its domain's authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.target: Ova poruka e-pošte nije ispunila zahtjeve za provjeru autentičnosti svoje domene. Može biti lažna ili nepropisno proslijeđena!

trans-unit.id: This email seems to be from a ProtonMail address but came from outside our system and failed our authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.source: This email seems to be from a ProtonMail address but came from outside our system and failed our authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.target: Čini se da je ova poruka e-pošte s adrese ProtonMail, ali je došla izvan našeg sustava i nije ispunila naše zahtjeve za provjeru autentičnosti. Može biti lažna ili nepropisno proslijeđena!

trans-unit.id: This message may be a phishing attempt. Please check the sender and contents to make sure they are legitimate.
trans-unit.source: This message may be a phishing attempt. Please check the sender and contents to make sure they are legitimate.
trans-unit.target: Ova poruka može biti pokušaj krađe identiteta. Provjerite pošiljatelja i sadržaj kako biste bili sigurni da su legitimni.

trans-unit.id: To prevent abuse of ProtonMail, we need to verify that you are human.
trans-unit.source: To prevent abuse of ProtonMail, we need to verify that you are human.
trans-unit.target: Da biste spriječili zlouporabu ProtonMaila, morate potvrditi da ste čovjek.

alt-trans.target: Da biste spriječili zlouporabu ProtonMail-a, morate potvrditi da ste čovjek.

trans-unit.id: To reset your mailbox password, please use the web version of ProtonMail at protonmail.ch
trans-unit.source: To reset your mailbox password, please use the web version of ProtonMail at protonmail.com
trans-unit.target: Da biste poništili lozinku sandučića e-pošte, upotrijebite web-verziju ProtonMaila na adresi protonmail.com

trans-unit.id: To reset your mailbox password, please use the web version of ProtonMail at protonmail.com
trans-unit.source: To reset your mailbox password, please use the web version of ProtonMail at protonmail.com
trans-unit.target: Da biste poništili lozinku sandučića e-pošte, upotrijebite web-verziju ProtonMaila na adresi protonmail.com

trans-unit.id: Warning: Before you pass the human check you can't sent email!!!
trans-unit.source: Warning: Before you pass the human check you can't sent email!!!
trans-unit.target: Upozorenje: Prije nego li prođete ljudsku provjeru, ne možete slati e-poštu!!!

trans-unit.id: Warning: You did not set a recovery email so account recovery is impossible if you forget your password. Proceed without recovery email?
trans-unit.source: Warning: You did not set a recovery email so account recovery is impossible if you forget your password. Proceed without recovery email?
trans-unit.target: Upozorenje: Vi niste postavili adresu e-pošte za oporavak računa, stoga je oporavak računa nemoguć u slučaju da zaboravite lozinku. Želite nastaviti bez e-pošte za oporavak?

trans-unit.id: We have successfully activated your subscription. Please relaunch the app to start using your new service plan.
trans-unit.source: We have successfully activated your subscription. Please relaunch the app to start using your new service plan.
trans-unit.target: Uspješno smo aktivirali vašu pretplatu. Ponovno pokrenite aplikaciju da biste počeli koristiti novi plan usluge.

trans-unit.id: We will send a verification code to the cell phone above.
trans-unit.source: We will send a verification code to the cell phone above.
trans-unit.target: Poslati ćemo kôd za potvrdu na gore navedeni telefonski broj.

trans-unit.id: We will send a verification code to the email address above.
trans-unit.source: We will send a verification code to the email address above.
trans-unit.target: Poslati ćemo kôd za potvrdu na gore navedenu adresu e-pošte.

trans-unit.id: We would like to know what we can do better.
trans-unit.source: We would like to know what we can do better.
trans-unit.target: Željeli bismo znati što možemo učiniti boljim.

alt-trans.target: Željeli bismo znati što možemo učiniti bolje.

trans-unit.id: What people see in the "From" field.
trans-unit.source: What people see in the "From" field.

trans-unit.id: When you send an email, this is the name that appears in the sender field.
trans-unit.source: When you send an email, this is the name that appears in the sender field.
trans-unit.target: Kada pošaljete poruku e-pošte, ovo je naziv koji se pojavljuje u polju pošiljatelja.

trans-unit.note: Warning message option to bypass validation and activate plan for current username

trans-unit.id: You are about to launch the web browser and navigate to
trans-unit.source: You are about to launch the web browser and navigate to
trans-unit.target: Upravo ćete pokrenuti web preglednik i otići na

trans-unit.id: You can customize swipe gestures in the ProtonMail App Settings.
trans-unit.source: You can customize swipe gestures in the ProtonMail App Settings.
trans-unit.target: Geste pokreta prsta možete prilagoditi u postavkama ProtonMail aplikacije.

trans-unit.id: You can get help and support at protonmail.com/support. Bugs can also be reported with the app.
trans-unit.source: You can get help and support at protonmail.com/support. Bugs can also be reported with the app.
trans-unit.target: Pomoć i podršku možete dobiti na protonmail.com/support. Pogreške možete prijaviti i pomoću aplikacije.

trans-unit.id: You can't set %@ address as default because it is a paid feature.
trans-unit.source: You can't set %@ address as default because it is a paid feature.
trans-unit.target: Ne možete postaviti %@ adresu kao zadanu jer je to plaćena značajka.

trans-unit.id: You enabled message expiration, but not all recipients support this. Please add a password and/or disable PGP sending to use expiration for all recipients.
trans-unit.source: You enabled message expiration, but not all recipients support this. Please add a password and/or disable PGP sending to use expiration for all recipients.
trans-unit.target: Omogućili ste vremenski istek poruke, ali to ne podržavaju svi primatelji. Dodajte lozinku i/ili onemogućite PGP slanje za korištenje isteka za sve primatelje.

trans-unit.id: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save it?
trans-unit.source: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save it?
trans-unit.target: Imate nespremljene promjene. Želite li ih spremiti?

trans-unit.id: You have used %d%% of your storage space (%@).
trans-unit.source: You have used %1$d%% of your storage space (%2$@).
trans-unit.target: Iskoristili ste %1$d%% od vašeg prostora za pohranu (%2$@).

trans-unit.id: You have used up all of your storage space (%@).
trans-unit.source: You have used up all of your storage space (%@).
trans-unit.target: Iskoristili ste sav prostor za pohranu (%@).

trans-unit.id: You need at least one recipient to send
trans-unit.source: You need at least one recipient to send
trans-unit.target: Potreban je barem jedan primatelj za slanje

trans-unit.id: Your inbox is now protected with end-to-end encryption. To automatically securely email friends, have them get ProtonMail! You can also manually encrypt messages to them if they don't use ProtonMail.
trans-unit.source: Your inbox is now protected with end-to-end encryption. To automatically securely email friends, have them get ProtonMail! You can also manually encrypt messages to them if they don't use ProtonMail.
trans-unit.target: Vaša pristigla pošta sada je zaštićena s end-to-end enkripcijom. Da biste automatski slali sigurne poruke e-pošte kontaktima, pozovite ih da koriste ProtonMail! Također možete ručno šifrirati poruke ako ne koriste ProtonMail.

trans-unit.id: Your new encrypted email account has been set up and is ready to send and receive encrypted messages.
trans-unit.source: Your new encrypted email account has been set up and is ready to send and receive encrypted messages.
trans-unit.target: Vaš novi šifrirani račun e-pošte je postavljen i spreman za slanje i primanje šifriranih poruka.

trans-unit.id: Your new secure email account is ready.
trans-unit.source: Your new secure email account is ready.
trans-unit.target: Vaš novi, sigurni račun e-pošte je spreman.

trans-unit.id: Your plan is currently active until
trans-unit.source: Your plan is currently active until
trans-unit.target: Vaš plan je trenutno aktivan do

trans-unit.id: Your plan will automatically renew on
trans-unit.source: Your plan will automatically renew on
trans-unit.target: Vaš će se plan automatski obnoviti

trans-unit.id: attempt remaining until secure data wipe!
trans-unit.source: attempt remaining until secure data wipe!
trans-unit.target: pokušaj preostalo do sigurnog brisanja podataka!

trans-unit.id: attempts remaining until secure data wipe!
trans-unit.source: attempts remaining until secure data wipe!
trans-unit.target: pokušaja preostalo do sigurnog brisanja podataka!

trans-unit.source: App Extension API is not available in this version of iOS

trans-unit.source: Failed to contact the Password Extension

trans-unit.source: Failed to execute script that collects web page information
trans-unit.target: Nije uspjelo izvođenje skripte koja prikuplja informacije o web stranici

trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script could not be evaluated
trans-unit.target: Ispunjavanje web stranice nije uspjelo jer skriptu nije moguće evaluirati

trans-unit.id: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.target: Ispunjavanje web-stranice nije uspjelo jer nedostaje skripta

trans-unit.id: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the Password Extension
trans-unit.target: Nije uspjelo dohvaćanje URL stringa iz web prikaza. Prikaz weba mora se u potpunosti učitati prilikom pozivanja proširenja lozinki

trans-unit.id: Failed to parse information returned by Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to parse information returned by Password Extension
trans-unit.target: Nije uspjelo parsiranje informacija koje je vratilo proširenje lozinki

trans-unit.id: Password Extension was cancelled by the user
trans-unit.source: Password Extension was cancelled by the user
